item.description: (Vasilis Agiomyrgianakis) Live coding at Megaron: Banqueting Hall - 11th Audiovisual Arts Festival May 21/17 - AKOYSMATA. Live coding KET 2018 Live coding Chimeres.space 2020 Contact details agios.mur@gmail.com https://github.com/Vasileios

Giorgos Diapoulis Live coding demo @ DCAC2021- EASTN-DC TOPLAP15 - aucotsi - 17 February 2019 13:30 Live coding in relays [demo] Contact details georgios.diapoulis@chalmers.se https://github.com/gewhere
Jason Svoronos Kanavas Sonification - live coding using oceanographic data | Python, SC, OF | 211005, Graz, AT Contact details jason.skk98@gmail.com https://github.com/JasonSKK
Iannis Zannos Contact details zannos@gmail.com iani.github.io

Παναγιώτα Αναστασοπούλου / Panagiota Anastasopoulou Hello there! I 'm Penny and I m a music technologist, composer and self-taught programmer. I am currently finishing my Musicology with specialization in Music Technology studies at University of Athens. I do lots of things around sound but my favourite is to make algorithmic and electro-acoustic compositions. I also really like coding and exploring concepts of DSP and Machine Learning to sound or music related processes.

Collaborative Live Coding Synergia session 210926 BasMyr - Jason Toplap GR ΤΟΠΛΑΠ - Ον-Off studio Athens Greece Penny-Giorgos-Vasilis Penny https://youtu.be/jeK8a7Xk0Bs Giorgos https://youtu.be/_2B34QPTDnA Vasilis https://youtu.be/7Lc2yYu7IBo Group session
